description.en: On deploy and at 50% health, stun nearby enemies for 5 seconds.
After hooking a target, deal double damage on the next attack.

details.advanced_info:
Melee cleave
Arc 140 degrees
Hook
5-second cooldown
Minimum range 3
Maximum acquire range 9
Targets the lowest max health Ranged enemy in range
Noxious Presence talent
Applies 1 stack of Poison every 3 seconds on a radius of 4
Does not hit flying minis
Cannonball talent
Stun radius 3.5
5-second baseline, 0.75 seconds level modifier, 1.25 seconds minimum duration
Stun will proc whenever Abomination enters below 50% health, so it can happen again if the Abomination is healed to above 50%

description.en: If played for 4 Gold or less, gain 100% Attack Speed.
If played for 5 Gold or more, redirect enemy Spell and Unbound deploys to Ancient of War's current location.

details.advanced_info:
Surge Health and damage scaling
Linear scaling per gold spent
Multiplier per gold spent 0.23999
For example, a level 1 Ancient of War has 850 health when played for 1 gold, 1054 (+204) health when played for 2 gold, and 1258 (+204 more again) health when played for 3 gold

description.en: Nearby Beast allies can consume a Chicken to heal themselves.
Deploy in a protective crate. When destroyed, Chickens emerge.

details.advanced_info:
Snackrifice talent
Eating a Chicken heals a Beast mini for 500
Walking Crate talent
Movement speed 2 (slow)
Single-target melee attack that deals 60 siege damage every second
Targeting based on having to turn as little as possible
210 health
